com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment

Class LocationFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment.IMapFragment
        • com.giift.sdk.ui.fragment.LocationFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.View.OnClickListener, android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, GetLocation.LocationCallback

    public class LocationFragment
extends IMapFragment
implements android.widget.AdapterView.OnItemClickListener, android.view.View.OnClickListener, GetLocation.LocationCallback
    Fragment with a static map at the top and a scrollable list of locations below. Possible arguments are:
    • Retailer.ID
    • com.giift.sdk.data.Dmo.ID
    • com.giift.sdk.data.Card.ID
    Author:
    Nicolas Lagier
